title: The Eminence in The Dungeon
text: Getting a did bite b'r'd thee decideth to tryeth hard and focus on not being acknown of the dang'rs ahead so thee might actually beest surprised, thus thee venture onward
into the dungeon, trying to attracteth the least attention to yourself and hark on to the h'ro and apprentice's conv'rsation.

buttons.text: The curiocity got over your head, you sweat as you want to know what going on behind this door. you walk in with immense confidence.
You feel the sheer power of the room and decide to 'chicken out'
